help.3:
To register for Starttime, you need to go to the main page of the service and click the "Register" button.

Fill in the required registration fields: specify an existing email address and create a password to log in to Starttime. Or register through the social channels VK or Facebook.
help.5: Confirmation of registration will come in the form of a letter to the email address specified during registration. You must follow the link in the letter, thereby confirming the registration. After that, you can fill out the profile and start using the service.
help.6: How to recover or change the password?
help.7: To recover your password, click on the “Forgot Password” link. You will be prompted to enter an e-mail, to which a new password will be sent
help.8: How to support the project you like?
help.9: Select a project, and the amount of contribution of interest and then make a payment.
help.11: How to deposit with a credit card?
help.12: To replenish the balance or make a payment using a bank card, you must:
help.15: in the form that appears, enter the card number, holder name, card validity period and CSV2 / CVV2
help.17: Confirm confirmation method (One-time SMS password or 3D Secure Code)
help.18: Enter the password and finally confirm the payment.
help.19: CSV2 / CVV2 are the last three digits indicated on the back of the card in the signature strip.
help.20: What to do if payment fails?
help.21: Contact the support service with a detailed description of the problem by e-mail r.nuriyeva@tsdservice.kz. Attach a screenshot depicting the problem.
help.22: Who sees the amount contributed to the project?
help.23: Contributor, author of the project and service administrators.
help.24: Can I make multiple contributions and receive multiple rewards?
help.25: Several rewards can be received in one project, if their number is not limited by the author.
help.26: Where to see information about my payments and purchases?
help.29: How to find out about the completion and results of the project?
help.30: Dates are indicated on the project page. Information about projects and news comes to contributors from authors by e-mail. After the completion of the project, the authors contact the contributors and report on the results of the project and sending remuneration.
help.31: How and when to get a reward?
help.32: The date of sending the fee is indicated at the end of the project in the author’s personal comments and in the project description section.
help.33: Is it possible to get a reward if the project is not completed yet?
help.34: Expect the completion of fundraising. After collecting funds, the author starts sending out rewards, or selects other delivery methods in agreement with the depositors, according to the previously agreed delivery conditions.
help.35: How the author will receive information about the contributor?
help.36: In order for the authors of the project to receive the information necessary for delivery and proper reward, during registration it is necessary to leave reliable data about yourself for feedback.
help.37: Is it possible to get a reward by living in another city?
help.38: Perhaps if the author of the project agrees with the terms of delivery with investors.
help.39: Who is responsible for fulfilling project obligations?
help.40: The author of the project is fully responsible for fulfilling obligations to investors.
help.41: What should I do if the funds were withdrawn from my electronic account and the fee was not provided by the author?
help.42: Contact service support with a detailed description of the problem. If possible, attach a screenshot of the problem to the email address r.nuriyeva@tsdservice.kz.
help.43: What if I never received my reward?
help.44: Check the timing of the rewards. If the terms for issuing remuneration have expired, contact the support service of the service at the email address r.nuriyeva@tsdservice.kz
help.45: Who should I contact if I have questions about the project?
help.46:
There is an “Ask a Question” button on the project page. Thus, the author of the project will see your question, and will answer in the near future.

You can also add a question in the comments to the project. If you have not received an answer to your question, write to the service support team at the email address r.nuriyeva@tsdservice.kz.

about.22: Crowdfunding (from the English crowdfunding) is a way of collective financing of projects in which money for creating a product comes from consumers (investors). Crowdfunding allows you to study the audience and evaluate the value of the idea.
about.2: Starttime.kz is a service that helps authors of interesting ideas find funds to implement their ideas through collective support. Starttime can be a social, commercial, or charitable idea. You can create a project, raise funds for the implementation of ideas or support talent by going through a simple registration. Applications are submitted by organizations and personally.
about.4: Starttime brings together the copyright holders (authors of the idea), the results of their work and contributors (fans, interested parties). In addition to supporting and promoting interesting copyright ideas. Starttime offers investors a unique product.
about.6: Starttime users are called contributors, as they can acquire a reward product of interest, thereby supporting the author’s project. So what is Starttime useful for?
about.7: You get direct contact with the authors of the project, you can ask them questions, organize cooperation and place an order for your favorite rewards.
about.8: You can become a participant in the creative process, which for some reason you wouldn’t decide yourself.
about.9: You can receive unique intangible rewards directly from the authors (for example, an author’s disc from musicians or visiting backstage after a concert).
about.10: You can communicate with other investors, provide support in promoting interesting projects for you.
about.12: What is Starttime useful for authors?
about.13: You gain access to an audience that is ready to support your undertaking, so there is no need to depend on intermediaries to promote your idea.
about.14: You get feedback from the audience, which helps to improve the idea and the final product
about.15: For a start-up business, Starttime is one of the opportunities to test a product without upfront costs, understand demand and conduct pre-sales.
about.16: Why contact Starttime if you can raise money on your website?
about.17: Starttime will help in attracting a new audience.
about.18: Starttime projects have personal curators who support and advise authors on project promotion.
about.19: The service provides informational support to projects, sending out Starttime Overview to subscribers weekly.
about.23: Difference of Starttime.kz from other resources.
about.24: Starttime project authors receive the following conditions:
about.25: Authors receive collected funds, even if they collected only 51% of the claimed amount.
about.26: Authors receive collected funds, even if they collected only 51% of the claimed amount.
about.27: Starttime offers authors their own project promotion tools.
about.28: Authors can communicate directly with contributors and receive contact information about the contributor.
about.29: Contributors can support multiple projects by earning rewards from different authors.
about.31: In the news, Starttime moderators post interesting information about projects and events, share tips on promoting projects, and talk about successful projects.
about.33:
A personal profile can be useful to the author of the project as an additional page on the social network. Here you can share creative plans, talk about events, answer questions. Also, the profile is a tool for promoting the project. The more information about the project you provide to investors, the more likely they are to be interested in support.

Also, a profile can be useful in creating the next project, looking for an audience for which it will not be difficult
about.34: Who can create projects at Starttime?
about.35: A project can be created by:
about.36: A citizen of the Republic of Kazakhstan who has reached the age of 18 and has a valid bank account
about.37: Company complying with and following Starttime conditions
about.38: Applications for which projects are considered by Starttime?
about.39: Starttime accepts applications for creative and socially significant ideas in all areas of activity that do not violate the copyrights and freedoms of other citizens, as well as do not contradict the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan
about.41: Creating and posting a project on Starttime is free. In case of successful completion of the project, the service withholds a commission from the project in the amount of 2-8% of the collected funds, depending on the project. If the author of the project is an individual, then the tax on income of an individual is transferred to the budget of the Republic of Kazakhstan from the amount in accordance with the tax legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

contacts.10: Starttime is a commercial and social online project created to simplify and develop public relations. As a crowdfunding service (public finance service), Starttime brings together target groups of authors and contributors.
contacts.11: Starttime also offers advertising positions for partners: from placing banners to creating special projects that are beneficial for business development.
contacts.13: Access to the audience of contributors and authors of creative and social projects;
contacts.15: Preview and testing of products that have not yet appeared on the market.
contacts.23: Bank Halyk Bank of Kazakhstan JSC
